PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08312020-10-23,  ,  ,  GAC,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectGeneral Coordination Agreement Between Canada and the United States of America - Use of the Radio Frequency Spectrum by Terrestrial Radiocommunication Stations and Earth Stations
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, or to delegate powers to sign, on behalf of Canada, subject to ratification, the GENERAL COORDINATION AGREEMENT BETWEEN CANADA AND THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA ON THE USE OF THE RADIO FREQUENCY SPECTRUM BY TERRESTRIAL RADIOCOMMUNICATION STATIONS AND EARTH STATIONS in order to modernize the Canada-United States bilateral framework used to manage interference along the border.
AttachmentsAttachment
